title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1729-1.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1729-1.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) A housing
company may either utilize the services of a managing agent or employ housing
company personnel to manage the housing development. (b) Where the division determines that there
is a need for increased management capacity and/or to improve the efficiency of
housing company operations, the housing company may be required by the division
to employ the services of a managing agent or additional staff with specific
expertise. (c) No later than

January 1st of each calendar year, the housing company shall provide the
division with a contact person's name, telephone number, fax number, e-mail
address, and mailing address for each such housing company. Any change to this
information during the course of the subsequent year must be provided to the
division in writing within 10 calendar days of such change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1729-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
